subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: For more than six decades, Willie McRae has worked the loop at Pinehurst No. 2 in North Carolina. He has carried the clubs for the course designer Donald Ross, walked the fairways with Michael Jordan and heard galleries roar as a caddie during the United States Open.
